name: [C] Utility and Stats Law
description: This law does helpful things for the GMs and also tracks nice stats for the citizens (how many trees felled, blocks mined, animals hunted and plants gathered)

properties.Title: Expropriation Automation
properties.UserDescription: Once a judge has approved the expropriation, this law gives the technical ability to execute it. This does NOT mean that the government official is allowed to do that, it does also NOT override the need for a judges approval!
